title: Add QueryMemoryBlocks tool to agent
goal: Enable the agent to retrieve relevant information from the LlamaIndex memory.
action_items: [ ] Wrap the `query_memory_blocks` function (from Task 2.3) into a LangChain `Tool`.
[ ] Define the tool's name (`QueryMemoryBlocks`), description (explaining its purpose for the agent), and input schema (e.g., using Pydantic).
[ ] Register this tool with the LangChain agent created in Task 3.1.
[ ] Update the agent's prompt to encourage using the tool when necessary.
[ ] Ensure the LlamaIndex index object is accessible to the tool function.
test_criteria: Invoke the agent with a query that should trigger memory retrieval (e.g., 'What is CogniDAO?', assuming relevant blocks exist).
Verify the agent calls the `QueryMemoryBlocks` tool.
Verify the agent's final response incorporates information from the retrieved memory blocks.
